Moves.Name: Acrobatics
Moves.Description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

Moves.Name: Aerial Ace
Moves.Description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. The attack lands without fail.

Moves.Name: Agility
Moves.Description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. It sharply boosts the Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Air Slash
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. It may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Amnesia
Moves.Description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Ancient Power
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. It may also raise all the user's stats at once.

Moves.Name: Attract
Moves.Description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

Moves.Name: Aura Sphere
Moves.Description: The user looses a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This move is certain to hit.

Moves.Name: Barrier
Moves.Description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Baton Pass
Moves.Description: The user switches places with a party Pokémon in waiting, passing along any stat changes.

Moves.Name: Blizzard
Moves.Description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

Moves.Name: Brick Break
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break any barrier such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Moves.Name: Bulk Up
Moves.Description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, boosting both its Attack and Defense stats.

Moves.Name: Bulldoze
Moves.Description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

Moves.Name: Calm Mind
Moves.Description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

Moves.Name: Charge
Moves.Description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Charge Beam
Moves.Description: The user attacks with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Confide
Moves.Description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Confusion
Moves.Description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. It may also leave the target confused.

Moves.Name: Cut
Moves.Description: The target is cut with a scythe or a claw. It can also be used to cut down thin trees.

Moves.Name: Dark Pulse
Moves.Description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. It may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Dazzling Gleam
Moves.Description: The user damages opposing Pokémon by emitting a powerful flash.

Moves.Name: Detect
Moves.Description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Moves.Name: Dig
Moves.Description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

Moves.Name: Disable
Moves.Description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

Moves.Name: Discharge
Moves.Description: A flare of electricity is loosed to strike the area around the user. It may also cause paralysis.

Moves.Name: Dive
Moves.Description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the second turn. It can be used to dive deep in the ocean.

Moves.Name: Double Team
Moves.Description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

Moves.Name: Double-Edge
Moves.Description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. It also damages the user by a fairly large amount, however.

Moves.Name: Dragon Claw
Moves.Description: The user slashes the target with huge, sharp claws.

Moves.Name: Dragon Rage
Moves.Description: This attack hits the target with a shock wave of pure rage. This attack always inflicts 40 HP damage.

Moves.Name: Dragon Tail
Moves.Description: The user knocks away the target and drags out another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Moves.Name: Dream Eater
Moves.Description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal the user's HP.

Moves.Name: Drill Peck
Moves.Description: A corkscrewing attack with the sharp beak acting as a drill.

Moves.Name: Earthquake
Moves.Description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

Moves.Name: Echoed Voice
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

Moves.Name: Embargo
Moves.Description: It prevents the target from using its held item. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

Moves.Name: Ember
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with small flames. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Endure
Moves.Description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Moves.Name: Energy Ball
Moves.Description: The user draws power from nature and fires it at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Explosion
Moves.Description: The user explodes to inflict damage on those around it. The user faints upon using this move.

Moves.Name: Facade
Moves.Description: An attack move that doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or has paralysis.

Moves.Name: False Swipe
Moves.Description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

Moves.Name: Fire Blast
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Fire Fang
Moves.Description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. It may also make the target flinch or leave it burned.

Moves.Name: Fire Spin
Moves.Description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire that rages for four to five turns.

Moves.Name: Flame Burst
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.

Moves.Name: Flame Charge
Moves.Description: The user cloaks itself with flame and attacks. Building up more power, it raises the user's Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Flamethrower
Moves.Description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Flare Blitz
Moves.Description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. The user sustains serious damage and may leave the target burned.

Moves.Name: Flash
Moves.Description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy. It can also be used to illuminate caves.

Moves.Name: Flash Cannon
Moves.Description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Fling
Moves.Description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. Its power and effects depend on the item.

Moves.Name: Fly
Moves.Description: The user soars, then strikes its target on the second turn. It can also be used for flying to any familiar town.

Moves.Name: Focus Blast
Moves.Description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def.

Moves.Name: Freeze-Dry
Moves.Description: The user rapidly cools the target. This may also leave the target frozen. This move is super effective on Water types.

Moves.Name: Frost Breath
Moves.Description: The user blows a cold breath on the target. This attack always results in a critical hit.

Moves.Name: Frustration
Moves.Description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

Moves.Name: Future Sight
Moves.Description: Two turns after this move is used, a hunk of psychic energy attacks the target.

Moves.Name: Giga Impact
Moves.Description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user must rest on the next turn.

Moves.Name: Grass Knot
Moves.Description: The user snares the target with grass and trips it. The heavier the target, the greater the damage.

Moves.Name: Growl
Moves.Description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

Moves.Name: Growth
Moves.Description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

Moves.Name: Guard Swap
Moves.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def with the target.

Moves.Name: Gust
Moves.Description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Gyro Ball
Moves.Description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user, the greater the damage.

Moves.Name: Hail
Moves.Description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all Pokémon except the Ice type.

Moves.Name: Heat Wave
Moves.Description: The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the opposing team. It may also leave targets with a burn.

Moves.Name: Hidden Power
Moves.Description: A unique attack that varies in type depending on the Pokémon using it.

Moves.Name: Hone Claws
Moves.Description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

Moves.Name: Hurricane
Moves.Description: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. It may also confuse the target.

Moves.Name: Hyper Beam
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user must rest on the next turn to regain its energy.

Moves.Name: Ice Beam
Moves.Description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy. It may also freeze the target solid.

Moves.Name: Ice Shard
Moves.Description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

Moves.Name: Incinerate
Moves.Description: The user attacks opposing Pokemon with fire. If a Pokemon is holding a certain item, such as a berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable

Moves.Name: Inferno
Moves.Description: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. It leaves the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Infestation
Moves.Description: The target is infested and attacked for four to five turns. The target can't flee during this time.

Moves.Name: Leech Seed
Moves.Description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

Moves.Name: Light Screen
Moves.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from special attacks for five turns.

Moves.Name: Low Sweep
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target's legs swiftly, reducing the target's Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Me First
Moves.Description: The user tries to cut ahead of the target to steal and use the target's intended move with greater power.

Moves.Name: Mega Punch
Moves.Description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

Moves.Name: Metronome
Moves.Description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

Moves.Name: Mind Reader
Moves.Description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

Moves.Name: Miracle Eye
Moves.Description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. It also enables an evasive target to be hit.

Moves.Name: Mist
Moves.Description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

Moves.Name: Nasty Plot
Moves.Description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. It sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk.

Moves.Name: Nature Power
Moves.Description: An attack that makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Moves.Name: Overheat
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil harshly reduces the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Moves.Name: Payback
Moves.Description: If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

Moves.Name: Peck
Moves.Description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

Moves.Name: Petal Blizzard
Moves.Description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

Moves.Name: Petal Dance
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

Moves.Name: Pluck
Moves.Description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

Moves.Name: Poison Jab
Moves.Description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. It may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Poison Powder
Moves.Description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

Moves.Name: Pound
Moves.Description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or a foreleg, etc.

Moves.Name: Powder Snow
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

Moves.Name: Power Swap
Moves.Description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk with the target.

Moves.Name: Power-Up Punch
Moves.Description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Protect
Moves.Description: It enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

Moves.Name: Psych Up
Moves.Description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

Moves.Name: Psychic
Moves.Description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. It may also reduce the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Psycho Cut
Moves.Description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

Moves.Name: Psyshock
Moves.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Moves.Name: Psystrike
Moves.Description: The user materializes an odd psychic wave to attack the target. This attack does physical damage.

Moves.Name: Quash
Moves.Description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

Moves.Name: Rain Dance
Moves.Description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves.

Moves.Name: Razor Leaf
Moves.Description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

Moves.Name: Recover
Moves.Description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

Moves.Name: Reflect
Moves.Description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to suppress damage from physical attacks for five turns.

Moves.Name: Reflect Type
Moves.Description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

Moves.Name: Rest
Moves.Description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. It fully restores the user's HP and heals any status problem.

Moves.Name: Retaliate
Moves.Description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this attack's damage increases.

Moves.Name: Return
Moves.Description: A full-power attack that grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

Moves.Name: Roar
Moves.Description: The target is scared off and replaced by another Pokémon in its party. In the wild, the battle ends.

Moves.Name: Rock Polish
Moves.Description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. It can sharply raise the Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Rock Slide
Moves.Description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing team to inflict damage. It may also make the targets flinch.

Moves.Name: Rock Smash
Moves.Description: The user attacks with a punch that can shatter a rock. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Rock Tomb
Moves.Description: Boulders are hurled at the target. It also lowers the target's Speed by preventing its movement.

Moves.Name: Roost
Moves.Description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

Moves.Name: Round
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

Moves.Name: Safeguard
Moves.Description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

Moves.Name: Sandstorm
Moves.Description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

Moves.Name: Scald
Moves.Description: The user shoots boiling hot water at its target. It may also leave the target with a burn.

Moves.Name: Scary Face
Moves.Description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly reduce its Speed stat.

Moves.Name: Scratch
Moves.Description: Hard, pointed, and sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Secret Power
Moves.Description: The user attacks the target with a secret power. Its added effects vary depending on the user's environment.

Moves.Name: Seed Bomb
Moves.Description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

Moves.Name: Shadow Ball
Moves.Description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

Moves.Name: Shadow Claw
Moves.Description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

Moves.Name: Sheer Cold
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.

Moves.Name: Sky Attack
Moves.Description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. It may also make the target flinch.

Moves.Name: Sky Drop
Moves.Description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

Moves.Name: Slash
Moves.Description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

Moves.Name: Sleep Powder
Moves.Description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

Moves.Name: Sleep Talk
Moves.Description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

Moves.Name: Sludge Bomb
Moves.Description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.

Moves.Name: Sludge Wave
Moves.Description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant sludge wave. It may also poison those hit.

Moves.Name: Smack Down
Moves.Description: The user throws a stone or projectile to attack an opponent. A flying Pokémon will fall to the ground when hit.

Moves.Name: Smokescreen
Moves.Description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. It reduces the target's accuracy.

Moves.Name: Snarl
Moves.Description: The user yells as if it is ranting about something, making the target's Sp. Atk stat decrease.

Moves.Name: Solar Beam
Moves.Description: A two-turn attack. The user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the second turn.

Moves.Name: Steel Wing
Moves.Description: The target is hit with wings of steel. It may also raise the user's Defense stat.

Moves.Name: Stone Edge
Moves.Description: The user stabs the foe with sharpened stones from below. It has a high critical-hit ratio.

Moves.Name: Strength
Moves.Description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power. It can also be used to move heavy boulders.

Moves.Name: Struggle Bug
Moves.Description: While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.

Moves.Name: Substitute
Moves.Description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

Moves.Name: Sunny Day
Moves.Description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves.

Moves.Name: Surf
Moves.Description: It swamps the area around the user with a giant wave. It can also be used for crossing water.

Moves.Name: Swagger
Moves.Description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Sweet Scent
Moves.Description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

Moves.Name: Swift
Moves.Description: Star-shaped rays are shot at the opposing team. This attack never misses.

Moves.Name: Swords Dance
Moves.Description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. It sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

Moves.Name: Synthesis
Moves.Description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

Moves.Name: Tackle
Moves.Description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

Moves.Name: Tailwind
Moves.Description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon for four turns.

Moves.Name: Take Down
Moves.Description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. It also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Taunt
Moves.Description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

Moves.Name: Thief
Moves.Description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. It can't steal if the user holds an item.

Moves.Name: Thunder
Moves.Description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Thunder Shock
Moves.Description: A jolt of electricity is hurled at the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Thunder Wave
Moves.Description: A weak electric charge is launched at the target. It causes paralysis if it hits.

Moves.Name: Thunderbolt
Moves.Description: A strong electric blast is loosed at the target. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

Moves.Name: Torment
Moves.Description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

Moves.Name: Toxic
Moves.Description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

Moves.Name: Transform
Moves.Description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

Moves.Name: Trick Room
Moves.Description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower Pokémon get to move first for five turns.

Moves.Name: U-turn
Moves.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Moves.Name: Venoshock
Moves.Description: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled if the target is poisoned.

Moves.Name: Vine Whip
Moves.Description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Volt Switch
Moves.Description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Moves.Name: Waterfall
Moves.Description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch. It can also be used to climb a waterfall.

Moves.Name: Wild Charge
Moves.Description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. It also damages the user a little.

Moves.Name: Will-O-Wisp
Moves.Description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

Moves.Name: Wing Attack
Moves.Description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

Moves.Name: Worry Seed
Moves.Description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making its Ability Insomnia.

Moves.Name: X-Scissor
Moves.Description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

Moves.Name: Zap Cannon
Moves.Description: The user fires an electric blast like a cannon to inflict damage and cause paralysis.
